devdoc.details: An "airdropper" or "bounty" contract for distributing an ERC20 token  en masse.This contract does not hold any tokens. Instead, it transfers directly  from a given source address to the recipients. Ensure that the source  address has set a sufficient allowance for the address of this contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Airdropper
